trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines constants for drive types, including CDRom, Fixed, Network, NoRootDirectory, Ram, Removable, and Unknown.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx XXXxx$ Xxxxx$ Xxxxxxx$ XxXxxxXxxxxxxxx$ Xxx$ Xxxxxxxxx$ xxx Xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive is an optical disc device, such as a CD or DVD-ROM.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx$ xxxx xx x XX xx XXX$XXX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive does not have a root directory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive is a removable storage device, such as a floppy disk drive or a USB flash drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx x XXX xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
